TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute>. For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md).
In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly. For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
## WPF Usage Notes <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied.
